mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Updegraff, J. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Updegraff, J.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 30 1861. By Telegraph from New York 30 1861. Sir I will accept if allowed am just leaving for Boston harker in charge of business of war will inform you when I can join on my return J Updegraff 28W61&50Coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Updegraff, J.
New York City, New York
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
